means: 犯罪，犯过错( sin的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He confessed to a priest that he had sinned.
sentence.Network_cn: 他向神父忏悔他犯了罪.

sentence.Network_en: They sinned against the unwritten rules of this meeting.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们违反了这次会议的不成文规定.

sentence.Network_en: You have sinned and must repent your ways.
sentence.Network_cn: 你犯了罪，必须为你的所作所为作出忏悔。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Never have sinned is unpardonable sin ., 从没犯过罪 , 是为了不可宽恕之罪.
i have sinned and i have suffered., 我施罪 , 我也受难.
We have sinned and rebelled and you have not forgiven ., 我们犯罪背逆 , 你并不赦免.
your first father sinned , and your mediators have rebelled against me ., 你的祖先犯了罪 , 你的中保背叛了我.

枕边陷阱 (Original sin) 如何分辨爱(love)跟情欲(lust)? 爱是不断地付出再付出(give)，情欲是不断地夺取再夺取(take) ... 男主角的.

entry.def: Sin or a sin is an action or type of behaviour which is believed to break the laws of God.

example.ex: The Vatican's teaching on abortion is clear: it is a sin...
example.tran: 罗马教廷对堕胎的教义非常清楚：这是罪过。

example.ex: Was it the sin of pride to have believed too much in themselves?
example.tran: 他们过分自信，这是否犯了骄纵之罪？

entry.def: If you sin, you do something that is believed to break the laws of God.

example.ex: The Spanish Inquisition charged him with sinning against God and man...
example.tran: 西班牙宗教法庭指控他亵渎上帝和人类。

example.ex: You have sinned and must repent your ways.
example.tran: 你犯了罪，必须为你的所作所为作出忏悔。

entry.tran: 罪恶;恶行;不道德的行为
entry.def: A sin is any action or behaviour that people disapprove of or consider morally wrong.

example.ex: The ultimate sin was not infidelity, but public mention which led to scandal.
example.tran: 最大的罪过不是通奸而是公众议论，是它导致了丑闻的发生。

entry.def: If you say that a man and a woman are living in sin, you mean that they are living together as a couple although they are not married.

example.ex: She was living in sin with her boyfriend.

auth_sentence.content: He believed that men had souls, that men sinned.
auth_sentence.res_content: He believed that men had souls, that men sinned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He believed that men had souls, that men sinned.

auth_sentence.content: Man is the reason man sinned and fell into damnation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Man is the reason man sinned and fell into damnation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Man is the reason man sinned and fell into damnation.

auth_sentence.content: It is man that sinned and created hell on earth.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is man that sinned and created hell on earth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is man that sinned and created hell on earth.
